thread.section_title: macs4u.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of macs4u.com | www.macs4u.com
thread.title: Nancy A.

author: Nancy A.
title: Nancy A.
text: Found a great deal on my used apple mac pro. After placing my order, I quickly received confirmation. The next day I was contacted by a representative to confirm my order and that it was me who placed the order since it was going to a different address which I appreciated. Representative was extremely professional and pleasant to speak with. It was delivered a day earlier than expected in great condition and with everything that it was supposed to come with. Will recommend to others!
